Control Name: Communicates Information on Reporting System Failures, Incidents, Concerns, and Other Matters—External users are provided with information on how to report systems failures, incidents, concerns, and other complaints to appropriate personnel.

control_attributes.Control: Communicates Information on Reporting System Failures, Incidents, Concerns, and Other Matters—External users are provided with information on how to report systems failures, incidents, concerns, and other complaints to appropriate personnel.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC2.3 COSO Principle 15: The entity communicates with external parties regarding matters affecting the functioning of internal control.
